new_commits.subject: Add utility functions using lodash
new_commits.body:
These utility functions depend on the lodash package.
This feature should be stacked on top of the lodash dependency PR.

new_commits.subject: Add lodash dependency for utility functions
new_commits.body:
This shared dependency will be used by future features.
It can safely land on its own without breaking main.

new_commits.subject: Add Feature B component
new_commits.body:
This is another independent feature that is unrelated to Feature A.
It should be in a separate PR that can land independently.

new_commits.subject: Add Feature A component
new_commits.body:
This is an independent feature that adds a new reusable component.
It can safely land on main without breaking anything.
